mapper.select: SELECT attendance_code, emp_id, attendance_type_code, start_date, end_date, assign_code, assign_emp_id, creation_date, reason FROM TB_ATTENDANCE_MANAGEMENT ORDER BY attendance_code
SELECT attendance_code, emp_id, attendance_type_code, start_date, end_date, assign_code, assign_emp_id, creation_date, reason FROM TB_ATTENDANCE_MANAGEMENT WHERE attendance_code = #{attendanceCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ATTENDANCE_MANAGEMENT ( attendance_code, emp_id, attendance_type_code, start_date, end_date, assign_code, assign_emp_id, creation_date, reason, title ) VALUES ( #{attendanceCode}, #{empId}, #{attendanceTypeCode}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{assignCode}, #{assignEmpId}, #{creationDate}, #{reason}, #{title} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ATTENDANCE_MANAGEMENT SET emp_id = #{empId}, attendance_type_code = #{attendanceTypeCode}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, assign_code = #{assignCode}, assign_emp_id = #{assignEmpId}, creation_date = #{creationDate}, reason = #{reason} WHERE attendance_code = #{attendanceCode}
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(attendance_type_code) FROM TB_ATTENDANCE_MANAGEMENT WHERE attendance_type_code LIKE CONCAT(#{creationDate}, '%')
